dialogs: Yeah! That's right! Who can't move now!
Anyways, I need to tell you something.
Like, even I couldn't do it, and I'm way better than you.
Well, you should turn back now.
There's no way you'll be able to get the sword at the top.
Because a guy is blocking the exit.
You need to get the sword first.
But you never will. So give up now!
